function.description:
Move a file from a `source` path to a `target` path returning an object containing the source destination ["from"] and the target destination ["into"]. `source` and `target` can be either relative or absolute paths.
This construct will rename a file if the source folder and target folder is the same.
Parameter `replaceExisting` determines if the move operation can replace existing target file. If set to `false` and the target file already exists it will fail. `replaceExisting` is `true` by default.
